name: oran

body.origin:
|- wb(wo(w0, w1), wn(wa(wn(w0), wn(w1))))
-| wb(wa(wn(w0), wn(w1)), wn(wo(w0, w1)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wo(w0, w1), wn(wa(wn(w0), wn(w1))))
-| wb(wa(wn(w0), wn(w1)), wn(wo(w0, w1)))

comment: Disjunction in terms of conjunction (De Morgan's law). Compare Theorem *4.57 of [WhiteheadRussell] p. 120. (Contributed by NM, 3-Jan-1993.) (Proof shortened by Andrew Salmon, 7-May-2011.)
